reviews.review: 已经没钱再来守护反恐世界啦！笑！龙狙宝石刀好想要！！！
You hate the game but you will always want to win another competitive match to rank up so you just keep playing.

More realistic shooting and sounds then most games like COD. 
Have to find the shooting pattern and its all about skill lol 
But this game can be fun in a group of friends
It is just a good game
